roleset.name: hungering, desiring

example.name: LV
example.text: I have a hankering to send someone flowers via Teleflora too .
example.arg: to send someone flowers via Teleflora too

example.name: both args
example.text: Callahan acknowledges that Churchill's judgment could indeed go remarkably wrong at times, for example in his hankering to launch an amphibious operation that would recover Singapore.
example.arg: to launch an amphibious operation that would recover Singapore

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, hanker.01. Corresponds to VNcls long-32.2-1, long-32.2-2.
